document_data.mainbody:
Sapper Gald was a cultist of the Absolute who lived in the Shattered Sanctum fortress during the late 15 century DR.
Gald had yellow-orange skin and wore simple clothing that included little armor.
As a "sapper", Gald was expected to strap a massive bomb to his back and directly at any structure or fortification that had to be destroyed in dramatic fashion.
As of the , Gald was among the goblins of the Shattered Sanctum who would immediately set out for the Emerald Grove, once ordered by True Soul Minthara Baenre.
